title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 6.25 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 6.25 - Penalties

State Regulations

Upon conviction for violation of any provision of article
19-A of the Vehicle and Traffic Law, the court shall impose a sentence
consisting of a fine of not less than $100 nor more than $250. Penalties
imposed under this section are not the same as any civil penalties imposed in
accordance with and under section
6.22
(e) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
6.25

Amended

New

York State Register March 15, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 11, eff. 3/15/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
